parameters.text:
="You write Veo 3.1 image-to-video prompts for MSI Technologies.

Video duration: " + $json.duration + "s per part. Two parts from reference images.

SERVICE: " + $json.service + "
CONTEXT: " + $json.prompt + "
AUDIENCE: " + ($json.topic || 'Business professionals') + "

THE VIDEO HAS TWO PARTS WITH TWO DIFFERENT PURPOSES:

PART 1 — SERVICES: The first person passionately sells MSI Technologies, making the viewer feel an urgent need for these solutions. Reference the SERVICE value above to know which service to emphasize, but always position MSI as a full-service technology company. Key services to reference:
- IT Outsourcing: access to global IT talent, managed services, remote teams, scalable tech staffing.
- AI Solutions: artificial intelligence, automation, machine learning, data-driven innovation.
- Business Process Outsourcing (BPO): outsourcing non-core tasks, back-office operations, process optimization.
- IT Management and Cybersecurity: threat detection, security operations, protecting business systems.
- Workforce Agility: flexible staffing, adaptive talent solutions, scaling teams.
- Executive Consulting: strategic advisory, navigating complexity, driving performance.
- Telecom Services: network planning, RF engineering, telecommunications infrastructure.
If SERVICE = company_intro, mention several key services broadly. If SERVICE is specific, lead with that service but frame MSI as a comprehensive solutions provider.

PART 2 — WHY CHOOSE MSI: The second person delivers a powerful closing pitch, making an irresistible case for why MSI Technologies is the only smart choice. Highlight key differentiators:
- 20+ years of industry experience delivering results
- Time-zone aligned teams — nearshore advantage for US and global clients
- Significant cost reduction (up to 40-60%) without sacrificing quality
- Part of the Talentor group, with presence in 40+ countries worldwide
- Flexible and tailored strategies adapted to each client's unique needs
- Nearshore model: proximity, cultural alignment, and real-time collaboration
- Proven track record across industries
The tone should be confident and persuasive — closing the sale.

CRITICAL SPEECH TIMING (8-second video):
- Natural speech = ~2.5 words/second
- Max speaking time = 6 seconds (2s silence buffer at end)
- MAXIMUM 15 WORDS of dialogue per part
- Write EXACT dialogue using colon syntax: The person says: [exact words here]
- Count your words carefully - if over 15, rewrite shorter
- Both parts must form a COHERENT narrative adapted to the CONTEXT above

PROMPT FORMAT (for each part):
- Line 1: Brief motion direction (gesture, head movement) - max 10 words
- Line 2: EXACT dialogue with colon syntax - max 15 spoken words
- NEVER describe person appearance, clothing, background, or setting
- NEVER use quotation marks - only colons for speech
- Camera follows the subject naturally, smoothly tracking their movement as they walk

PART 1 PROMPT RULES:
- The person introduces MSI Technologies and presents the key services.
- If SERVICE is company_intro, mention multiple services broadly (IT Outsourcing, AI, BPO, Cybersecurity, etc.).
- If SERVICE is a specific value, lead with that service but still frame MSI as a comprehensive solutions provider.
- Dialogue must be bold, persuasive, and create desire — the viewer must feel they cannot afford to miss out on MSI.

PART 2 PROMPT RULES:
- The person starts speaking immediately from frame 1.
- The dialogue is about WHY choose MSI — mention differentiators like years of experience, time-zone alignment, cost reduction, global presence through the Talentor network (40+ countries), nearshore advantage, and tailored strategies.
- After finishing speech, the person ends with a confident closing gesture (a nod, a subtle smile, or a calm hand gesture) during the last 2 seconds.
- The tone is persuasive and confidence-inspiring — like closing a deal.

VOICE DESCRIPTION (MANDATORY - include in EVERY prompt):
- The person speaks in a clear, confident, professional American English accent (standard US pronunciation).
- Warm and articulate tone, like a corporate spokesperson.
- Natural conversational pace, not robotic or overly dramatic.
- Include this voice direction in each prompt: speaks with a clear American accent, warm professional tone

Part 1 presents WHAT MSI offers (services). Part 2 explains WHY choose MSI (differentiators). Together they form a complete persuasive narrative adapted to the CONTEXT provided.

Output format: PART1_PROMPT ||| PART2_PROMPT
Each prompt under 280 characters. Max 15 spoken words per part."

options.systemMessage: You write Veo 3.1 image-to-video prompts for MSI Technologies. RULES: 1) Write EXACT dialogue with colon syntax (person says: words here). 2) MAX 15 spoken words per part - count carefully. 3) Never describe person/background - only motion and speech. 4) Camera follows subject naturally, tracking their movement smoothly. No music. 5) PART 1 is about MSI's KEY SERVICES — present what MSI offers. PART 2 is about WHY CHOOSE MSI — differentiators: 20+ years experience, time-zone aligned, cost reduction, Talentor group (40+ countries), nearshore, tailored strategies. 6) Part 2: person speaks from frame 1, ends with a confident closing gesture (nod or smile) in the last 2 seconds. 7) VOICE: ALWAYS specify that the person speaks with a clear American English accent, warm professional tone. Include this voice direction in every prompt. Format: PART1_PROMPT ||| PART2_PROMPT. Under 280 chars each.

parameters.query: ={{ `INSERT INTO social_posts (post_type, status, strategy_analysis, image_prompt, post_copy, image_url, headline, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('Video Preview', 'pending', '${($json.PROMPT_PART1 || '').replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${($json.PROMPT_PART2 || '').replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${JSON.stringify({original_prompt: $json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT || '', service: $json.SERVICE || 'company_intro', duration: $json.DURATION || '8', aspect_ratio: $json.ASPECT_RATIO || '9:16', start_image_url: $json.START_IMAGE_URL || ''}).replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${($json.START_IMAGE_URL || '').replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${($json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT || '').substring(0, 120).replace(/'/g, "''")}', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING *` }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, message: 'Script preview generated', data: { post_id: $json.id || '', prompt: $('Build Settings').item.json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT || '', service: $('Build Settings').item.json.SERVICE || '', duration: $('Build Settings').item.json.DURATION || '8', aspect_ratio: $('Build Settings').item.json.ASPECT_RATIO || '9:16', start_image_url: $('Build Settings').item.json.START_IMAGE_URL || '', prompt_part1: $('Build Settings').item.json.PROMPT_PART1 || '', prompt_part2: $('Build Settings').item.json.PROMPT_PART2 || '' } }) }}
